entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: Sismo: Vibration Meter & Alert
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 18.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 18.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes ! How it works Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes. Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area. Check the vibrations with your phone! Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease. Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options. Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views. Special Views ; ● OSCILLOSCOPE The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk. ● METRONOME Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance. ● GEYSER Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound. ● WAVE The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision. Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device. In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FyTube -沒有廣告的 YouTube
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 148.00 → HK$ 38.00 [免費 ~ HK$ 148.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 38.00

应用描述

我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！ 主要功能亮點： • 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。 • 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。 • 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。 • 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。 此外還包括： • 可切換字幕 • 播放速度控制 • 質量選擇和全屏模式 • 智能搜索，即時建議（預測搜索） • 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年 FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。 盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！ 特別功能 浮動播放 永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。 只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。 無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！ 鎖屏播放 無中斷收聽！ 即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。 如何激活？ 只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。 點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。 睡眠定時器 安然入睡——應用會自動停止！ 啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。 如何激活？ 點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。 放鬆，剩下的交給應用！ 循環模式 反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！ 啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。 怎麼知道它是否開啟？ 啟動時圖標會變紅。 （支援VoiceOver：會提示開啟或關閉狀態。） 非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！ 需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube 基本功能 • 全屏高清播放 • 簡單易用的介面，友好設計 • 隨時快進或倒退——不錯過精彩部分 • 啟用字幕 • 根據喜好調整播放速度 • 更改視頻質量 • 智能搜索，即時建議和上傳日期篩選：天、週、月、年、全部 • 每個視頻包含相關視頻區，發現更多有趣內容 • 發現最新視頻，保持資訊更新 • 應用直接連接YouTube，讓您找到任何視頻 • 支援任何兼容AirPlay的設備播放 • 支援VoiceOver（增強描述） • 無需帳號 • 未經您允許，不儲存快取、Cookie或個人資料——安全觀看 • 介面支援29種語言 • 無廣告，無訂閱 購買FyTube一次付費，開啟無廣告無訂閱的新串流體驗。 最低要求： • iOS 13或更高版本 • 3G及以上網路連接 隱私政策： https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube 服務條款： https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube 與我們應用相關的關鍵詞： youtube，youtube音樂，youtube vanced，YouTube廣告攔截器，無訂閱，跳過YouTube廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告，YouTube應用，YouTube廣告屏蔽，攔截彈窗，移除廣告，屏蔽廣告，廣告攔截，內容屏蔽，無廣告，無廣告瀏覽器，攔截廣告，跳過廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告YouTube，無廣告視頻等。 有關如何使用FyTube的問題？ 訪問fydub.com/fytube或聯繫我們——我們樂意為您服務。所有郵件均有回覆：fytube@fydub.com FyTube與YouTube合作。 YouTube名稱和標誌為Google公司註冊商標。版權所有。 © FyTube®

entry.content:

全部价格信息

App 內購買項目

  • 綜合禮包：HK$ 128.00
  • 寶石300個：HK$ 32.00
  • 戒指禮包：HK$ 188.00
  • 魔法禮包：HK$ 68.00
  • 魅魔禮包：HK$ 328.00
  • 寶石660個：HK$ 68.00
  • 地獄禮包：HK$ 188.00
  • 喚生石1100個：HK$ 32.00

应用描述

GameCoaster你想一個有趣的遊戲，但小一開發商的第二個工作 ※ 最有可能引進 遊戲以治療入侵者到來猛攻成為保護地牢守護者！ 盲目地扔你有武器，它必須以免攻擊地牢。 級別和項目養殖，地牢重塑，從性能的保證，雅可怕的敵人當心！ ※ 故事 拉什是世界上所有的怪物，以期佔領這個世界的最後一個地牢， 勇敢和亨特，旨在保證這個怪物，放在幫助。 為了保護地牢入侵者，你可以拿出已經堆成了一座武器。 ※ 遊戲特色 ◈請盡量記住復古的圖形和聲音的懷舊回憶。 ◈容易玩，任何人都可以很容易地享受。 ◈高興地屠殺敵人即將到來喉嚨按丈夫！它給人以強烈的打擊感和愉悅。 ◈請盡量協同作用，並使用武器的不同！ ◈準時提供一個新的擔保實現的結果！ -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283 @ GameCoaster

iPad

entry.title: DungeonSquad
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 38.00 → HK$ 18.00 [HK$ 18.00 ~ HK$ 38.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 18.00

App 內購買項目

  • Autonomy：HK$ 22.00
  • Time Flow：HK$ 22.00
  • 賽季通行證：HK$ 58.00
  • 角色通行證：HK$ 88.00
  • 尼奧禮包：HK$ 38.00
  • 婚禮禮包：HK$ 38.00
  • 勇者研究：HK$ 48.00
  • 解鎖性質：HK$ 58.00
  • 賽季０戰鬥通行證：HK$ 18.00
  • 墮落禮包：HK$ 58.00

应用描述

Dungeon Maker與Dungeon Defense開發商＂Game Cosater＂的最新力作！ 因無數勇者們的侵略，副本已成廢墟，魔界也遭受破壞。 你為了重建魔界，需要侵略勇者們的根據地。 在那裡，恢復魔界的力量，並擊敗光之軍隊吧。 你要獨自入侵已被光所支配的星球。 擊敗勇者，並以他們為祭品，召喚出怪物作為你的夥伴吧， 同時也要從勇者身上奪取裝備來武裝。 得到強大的力量，就可以獲得魔界之魔神們的祝福。 接合魔神與怪物的力量，壓制巨大的勇者軍團吧。 ◇ 10隻精英怪物與100個以上的專屬技能 ◇ 重建度越高，魔界的力量就越來越強大 ◇ 隨機選擇與機會所構成的Roguelike玩法 謝謝。

应用截屏

entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 88.00 → HK$ 58.00 [HK$ 22.00 ~ HK$ 88.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 58.00

App 內購買項目

  • Orbit Pack：HK$ 38.00

应用描述

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: 1941 Frozen Front Premium
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 22.00 → HK$ 8.00 [HK$ 8.00 ~ HK$ 22.00]）

全部价格信息

  • 700,000資金：HK$ 688.00
  • 325,000資金：HK$ 368.00
  • 125,000資金：HK$ 148.00

应用描述

領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。 感受令人震撼的二戰場景，盡在HandyGames™的全新模擬類軍事策略遊戲！ 任務簡報 在1941年東部戰線的刺骨嚴寒中戰鬥！ 指揮坦克和步兵 攻克敵陣！ 派重型轟炸機 炸平敵軍指揮部！ 在惡劣地形中佈置你的炮兵部隊！ 為部隊提供物資和彈藥！ 抵禦人數遠超自身的敵人！ - 去除廣告！ - 二戰題材的回合制策略遊戲 - 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務 - 白熱化的多人戰鬥 - 經典的德國 和蘇聯部隊 - 戰鬥中可修理，偽裝，構築各種人員和建物 - 雙方擁有步兵，炮兵，坦克和空軍 - 六角網格可一覽無餘 - 細膩的圖片和極為真實的聲效 感謝您選擇1941 Frozen Front！

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

应用描述

在期盼已久的 「 Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！ 每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。 特色： - 去除廣告！ - 一流遊戲「 Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集 - 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！ - 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲 - 照顧好羊羣 - 飼養甜美的小羔羊 - 積極和羊羣玩耍 - 給牠們提供許多不同的物品 - 種植並收割不同的資源 - 剪羊毛 - 自定義農場 - 控制天氣 - 日夜循環 - 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定 - 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣 - 支持MFi遊戲手柄 - 支持Game Center 感謝您選擇 'Clouds & Sheep 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見： 聯絡 HandyGamesTM: http://www.handy-games.com 在 Facebook 上關注我們：http://www.fb.com/handygames 在 Google+上及時瞭解動態： http://goo.gl/qkjngm 訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY 在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞： http://www.twitter.com/handy_games 在 Instagram 上關注我們： http://instagram.com/handygames © www.handy-games.com GmbH

应用描述

將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！ 特色 - 去除廣告！ - 中世紀的各種城市營建方式 - 聰明的居民忙碌於日常事務 - 複雜經濟模擬，深度生產鏈 - 數十種不同的城鎮和生產建物 - 軍事功能可選，可訓練士兵，智鬥強盜 - 季節、天氣，都有意義，都有效果 - 火災、疫病、乾旱及更多毀滅性災難 - 豐富多樣的情景和挑戰任務 - 無限制的沙盒遊戲模式 - 支持Game Center

应用描述

孩子們，你們準備好了嗎？扮演海綿寶寶、派大星和珊迪，向邪惡的痞老闆展示犯罪得到的報酬甚至比蟹老闆還少。想利用強大的泡泡，從眾多猖獗的機器人那裏拯救比奇堡嗎？當然！想要蹦極？為什麼不呢！戰鬥正在進行中！ 特點： ● 扮演海綿寶寶、派大星和珊迪，並運用他們的獨特技能組合 ● 挫敗痞老闆的邪惡計劃——用他的古怪機器人大軍統治比奇堡 ● 遇見心愛系列中的無數角色 ● 忠實地重製了史上最好的海綿寶寶遊戲之一 ● 高端視覺效果，現代解析度和精心打磨的遊戲玩法 ● 全面控制器支持 ● 支持 Game Center 感謝您選擇 SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見： 聯絡 HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com 在 Facebook 上關注我們：HandyGames 訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames 在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games 在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames © www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: LMP - Music Hub
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 22.00 → HK$ 8.00 [HK$ 8.00 ~ HK$ 22.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 8.00

应用描述

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin. ▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant. ▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers. ▣ Manage playlists with ease LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist. When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy. ▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track. ▣ Support LRC lyrics LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing. ▣ Browser Assistant Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

entry.title: AudioTools, dB, Sound & Audio
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 148.00 → HK$ 88.00 [HK$ 88.00 ~ HK$ 148.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 88.00

App 內購買項目

  • SPL Pro Module：HK$ 58.00
  • ETC Module：HK$ 48.00
  • SPL Graph Module：HK$ 88.00
  • Polarity Test Module：HK$ 32.00
  • SoundScope VR：HK$ 188.00
  • IR Module：HK$ 388.00
  • Speaker Distortion：HK$ 48.00
  • VU Meter：HK$ 22.00
  • SPL Traffic Light：HK$ 88.00
  • Impedance Module：HK$ 228.00

应用描述

AudioTools from Studio Six Digital is a suite of professional-grade audio and acoustic analysis apps. Included in the price of this app is a great collection of professional tools -- SPL, RTA, FFT, Speaker Polarity Test, Generator, Audio Scope, CLF Viewer, and Recorder, and the framework to add more powerful modules as you need them. Customize AudioTools for your needs by buying any of the additional optional modules, like Smaart Tools I, SPL Graph, or Impulse Response, at any time right from your iOS device. We test every iOS device and calibrate the microphone level and frequency response for the best results. We have the ability to turn off the Apple low frequency filters, and on many devices we can measure up to 120 dB SPL. Add iTestMic, iPrecisionMic, or iAudioInterface2 for a complete professional audio and acoustic test and measurement platform. Actual reviews: “...AudioTools is a “how did I ever live without it” app”. “I think this application is the best I EVER purchased.” “I have used many thousands of dollars of complicated test equipment that doesn’t measure up to this app suite.” ***** Included in the app price ***** * SPL Meter A faithful reproduction of a classic analog SPL meter. Includes A and C weighting, and Fast and Slow ANSI decay modes. All filters meet or exceed ANSI type 1. * RTA A 1/3 and octave band Real Time Analyzer. Includes touch-GUI range control, a cursor, max/min bars, and noise curve overlays. * FFT Detailed acoustic analysis, up to 32876 points. View full detail or smooth to 1/24, 1/6, 1/3 or octave. Includes cursor, scalable graphics, and peak tracking. * Polarity Speaker polarity checker. Route the test signal to a speaker, and read the polarity of the speaker on the screen. * CLF Viewer Show loudspeaker data, including plots for impedance, axial response, sensitivity, polar response, and 6dB coverage, and a 3D color balloon plot. * Delay Finder Measures the time it takes for a pulse to return from a speaker. * Generator Generates sine waves, square waves, white and pink noise. * Line Level Tests A line level measurement function and frequency counter. * Audio Scope A dual-channel audio oscilloscope that includes auto-triggering, variable gain and sweep rate, and storage of scope images. * Recorder A mono/stereo audio recorder with WAV and compressed formats and 8k-48k sample rate. Transfer files via WIFI. * File transfer of results via wifi to PC / Mac. * Audio Calculators ***** Optional modules available for purchase from within AudioTools ***** * SoundScope VR - FFT-based audio analyzer with VR. The powerful acoustical analysis module. Includes RTA graphs to 1/48th octave and Spectrograph, and can display VR. * Transfer Function -- Requires 2-channel interface. Two-channel FFT-based measurement. Allows you to analyze sound system performance with music or pink noise as the signal source. * ETC Energy Time Curve. Plot decay of an impulse over time, and compute RT60 time. Internal or External trigger. * Impulse Response Record and analyze an impulse or sine sweep, compute octave and 1/3 octave ETC, T30, C50, C80, CT, Definition. * LARSA Fast and accurate sine-sweep measurement of loudspeakers and rooms. * SPL Pro Digital SPL meter with ANSI Slow, Fast, Peak, and Impulse mode, along with LEQ. Includes A and C weighting, and all 10 octave band filters. * SPL Graph Plot second-by-second SPL level for up to 24 hours, and optionally record the audio. Also, add the optional Octave Band Logging upgrade to elevate this tool to rival any professional logging SPL Meter. * SPL Traffic Light Monitor live sound levels SPL and Leq and see status in a simple green-yellow-red display. * STIPA Speech Intelligibility Meets the current NFPA code standards for testing evac systems and schools. * Speaker Distortion Measure THD+n of any driver. * THD+n (requires iAudioInterface) * Impedance Meter and Plot (requires iAudioInterface) * Phase Meter * Amplitude Sweep

entry.title: 7Days : Backer
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 38.00 → HK$ 2.00 [HK$ 2.00 ~ HK$ 38.00]）

全部价格信息

应用描述

您是否對相同的舊小說感到厭倦？您是否對交互式故事遊戲、視覺小說、聊天類社交遊戲和獨立遊戲感興趣，但是您已經厭倦了相同的舊遊戲？如果是這樣，您應該查看《七天》，一部視覺小說、決策性的神秘遊戲。 《七天》是一部了不起的神秘視覺小說故事類遊戲。這是一個獨特、決策類的講故事遊戲，而用戶可以根據自己的選擇創建自己的獨特故事。 通過聊天風格的視覺小說類游戲，我們將提供最佳的故事遊戲體驗和豐富的神秘故事情節，專門適用於移動設備。這是一款給您強烈推薦的遊戲。 ■ 詳細講解遊戲 您做出的每一個選擇都會改變您的故事。 每個小小的選擇都會改變您與同志們的關係， 並在關鍵時刻改變您和同志們的命運。 您可以是反派，或一位可信賴的同志。 一切都取決於您的選擇。 ■ 概要 有的死靈在死亡世界中經受了復活的考驗。 死亡使者給他們分配了一項任務，而他們必須互相攻擊或共同合作。您的角色，基雷爾也必須完成分配給她的選擇性任務。 但是她的任務需要其他人去死...... 您只有七天 您會做出什麼樣的選擇？ 立即體驗這個發人深省的故事。 ■ 遊戲特色 - 圖形新穎的小說類藝術品，具有驚人的圖形 - 在生與死之間切換的獨特遊戲設置 - 根據您的選擇而變化的故事情節 - 各種成就和隱藏的挑戰 - 根據故事的不同情節和結局 - 具有神秘感的文字冒險 - 精彩的講故事遊戲 ■ 推薦給那些誰： - 對文字 / 互動內容感興趣，例如視覺小說、故事遊戲、聊天遊戲和社交遊戲 -對獨特的獨立遊戲充滿熱情，例如《傳說之下》 - 正在尋找帶有神秘和 / 或恐怖元素的講故事遊戲 - 正在尋找終極遊戲，因為他們厭倦了平常的故事類遊戲 - 對其他類型的冒險遊戲感興趣 - 我們還推薦《黑暗界辦公室：鬼怪遊戲》，這是我們的又一款出色的遊戲。 ■ 我們保證它會很有趣。立即下載並體驗 如果您發現任何問題或有好的建議，請將它們發送至help@buffstudio.com。我們將努力製作出更好的視覺小說、故事、療愈、獨立，講故事、冒險類遊戲。 ■ 我們需要您的支持，以製作更好的故事遊類戲。請將此故事遊戲推薦給您的家人和朋友。這將對我們有很大的幫助。

entry.title: This War of Mine
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 118.00 → HK$ 18.00 [HK$ 18.00 ~ HK$ 118.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 18.00

App 內購買項目

  • The Little Ones：HK$ 18.00

应用描述

"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK "This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps "I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better. This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? Key Features: • Inspired by real-life events • Control your survivors and manage your shelter • Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive • Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience • Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game • Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands. • Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine • Protect innocent children • Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need • Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

Feeling overwhelmed by the chaos of life? Find your peace and vitality with BreatheIn, the app that helps you unlock the power of mindful breathing. Rediscover Calm and Energy Deep, mindful breathing is the key to a calm mind and a vibrant body. With BreatheIn, immerse yourself in guided exercises that harmonize your body and mind, leading to true balance and renewal. Expertly Curated Practices We've handpicked and tested each exercise to ensure you get the best. Start your journey toward a healthier, more fulfilled life today! Seamless Apple Health Integration Track your progress effortlessly—BreatheIn automatically syncs with Apple Health, making it easy to monitor your wellness journey. Explore a Range of Techniques - Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): Regain control and calm your mind. - Relax Breathing (4-7-8): Beat anxiety and fall asleep faster. - Bee Breathing: Soothe your mind with this relaxing technique. - Coherent Breathing: Improve your well-being through HRV enhancement. - Transform Your Life, One Breath at a Time Conquer stress, boost your resilience, and rediscover balance with every breath. Download BreatheIn now and take the first step toward a more vibrant, peaceful you!
